get.description: Get a specific published course by ID.
Search across published courses, lessons, and plans.
Return current user profile and admin status.

schema.title: Response List Courses Admin Courses Get
Response List Lessons Admin Courses  Course Id  Lessons Get
Response List Plans Admin Courses  Course Id  Plans Get

post.description: Revoke all entitlements for a user.

get.description: Get current user's access status and entitlements.

Check if user can access a specific course.
Returns 200 { "allowed": true } if allowed.
Returns 403 if not allowed.
Returns 404 if course does not exist.
